DOC.brief_title: A Study To Test The Effect Of GW786034 ( Pazopanib ) On P450 Enzymes
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Histologically cytologically confirm diagnosis advance solid tumor . Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 1 . Adequate bone marrow , renal , lung , liver function . A female subject must pregnant agree become pregnant trial Exclusion criterion : Any major surgery , chemotherapy , hormone therapy , investigational drug , radiotherapy within last 28 day . Poorly control hypertension . Corrected QT ( QTc ) prolongation define QTc interval great equal 480 msec prior history cardiovascular disease , arrhythmia , significant ECG abnormality . Arterial venous thrombus ( include cerebrovascular accident ) , myocardial infarction , admission unstable angina , cardiac angioplasty , stenting within last 3 month . Current use therapeutic anticoagulation ( low molecular weight heparin , oral anticoagulant agent ) . Amiodarone must take least 6 month prior administration first dose study drug . History brain metastasis . Has narrowangle glaucoma contraindication midazolam use . History nicotinecontaining product ( include cigarette , cigar , nicotine patch ) use within past 6 month . A history bleeding problem .
